meta.title: Rainbow Obby - Colorful Sky Adventure
meta.description: Join Rainbow Obby, a vibrant obstacle course game where you leap through colorful platforms and conquer challenges in the sky!

hero.title: Welcome to Rainbow Obby!
hero.subTitle: Can you conquer the colorful obstacle course in the sky?

features.title: Key Features
features.subTitle: Discover the exciting elements of Rainbow Obby.

items.title: Vibrant Level Design
items.description: Experience stunning visuals as you navigate through a colorful maze filled with challenging platforms.

items.title: Dynamic Gameplay
items.description: Enjoy a unique fan-made version with new items like trampolines and speed strips that add depth to your journey.

items.title: Checkpoint System
items.description: Never lose your progress! Reach checkpoints after each stage to respawn quickly if you fall.

items.title: Beginner-Friendly Challenges
items.description: Perfect for players of all skill levels, providing both fun and a satisfying challenge.

howToPlay.title: How to Play?
howToPlay.subTitle: Get started on your adventure with these simple steps.

items.text: Click anywhere to begin, use the WASD keys to move, and press spacebar to jump.
Reach checkpoints at the end of each stage for quick respawning.
Utilize the camera to judge your jumps accurately, especially on distant platforms.
Master the timing of your jumps and stay calm to overcome tricky sections.

items.question: Is Rainbow Obby free to play?
items.answer: Yes! You can play Rainbow Obby for free on any web browser.

items.question: Do I need to download anything?
items.answer: No downloads are required; simply start playing directly in your browser.

items.question: What should I do if I fall off a platform?
items.answer: You'll respawn at the last checkpoint you reached, so don't worry!

items.question: Are there different difficulty levels?
items.answer: The game is designed to be beginner-friendly while still offering challenging gameplay.
